title: Army surgeon general: 'Engagement' key to civilian readiness (The United States Army)
text: ( Source : The United States Army ) WASHINGTON ( Army News Service , Oct. 15, 2015 ) -- Civilian workforce 'engagement' is another way to bolster Army readiness, Army Surgeon General Lt. Gen. Patricia Horoho said. Readiness, which has been
